product_name: The North Face Blue Ridge PacLite Rain Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Extremely lightweight and compressible, the waterproof, breathable Blue Ridge PacLite jacket from The North Face offers total protection without weighing you down during your outdoor adventures. 2.5-layer Gore-Tex(R) PacLite(R) is light, packable and more breathable than other 2- or 3-layer Gore-Tex fabrics. Micro seam allowances increase breathability and suppleness, and save weight; all seams are sealed for complete protection. Hood with laminated brim and hidden cordlocks adjusts for good visibility in all directions. Full-length front zipper with internal windflap; softly lined chin guard feels nice next to skin. Hidden hem drawcord and nonabrasive molded cuffs tabs; mesh-lined hand pockets double as core vents; zippers are watertight. The North Face Blue Ridge jacket features a slim, performance fit. The North Face Summit Series(TM) apparel is designed and tested for use in harsh environments. Closeout.
short_description: Extremely lightweight and compressible, the waterproof, breathable Blue Ridge PacLite jacket from The North Face offers total protection without weighing you down during your outdoor adventures.
